name: CapitalGame
0:
”Alexa, open Capital Game”
”Alexa, start Capital Game”
”Alexa, launch Capital Game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: capital game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is Capital game a skill where you will be asked in random order the capitals of the world. At the end you will be given a score, for each capital guessed you will accumulate a point. The skill will be constantly updated with new questions and new features.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.
